SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.control

Class ControllerGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.control.ControllerGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ControllerGame extends Object implements Serializable
Controller for the game, handling game logic and interactions between model components.
See Also:

    • checkLobby

      protected Response checkLobby()
      check if the lobby is full, if it is, it the game starts, otherwise it adds the player to the lobby
      Returns:
      a Response message to the client

    • sendPrivateUpdates

      public void sendPrivateUpdates()
      This method sends to all clients the new state of the Game, contained in the GameSerialized. This method is used to send an update of the Game everytime that a normal action is completed

    • sendEndGame

      public void sendEndGame()
      this method sends to all clients an EndGameMessage, containing the Game Serialized

    • isUsernameAvailable

      public boolean isUsernameAvailable(String username) throws NullPointerException
      Check if the username is available
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player
      Returns:
      true if available, false if not
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if username is null

    • fillBoard

      public void fillBoard()
      Fills the game board with object cards based on the number of players. This method should be called at the beginning of the game to set up the board.

    • checkIfRefill

      public boolean checkIfRefill()
      Check if the board needs to be refilled
      Returns:
      true if it needs to be refilled, false if not

    • refillBoard

      public void refillBoard()
      Fills the game board again with object cards based on the number of players. This method should be called at the beginning of the game to set up the board.

    • loadShelf

      public void loadShelf(List<ObjectCard> objectCards, int column)
      Load the shelf with the ObjectCard, the order has already been established
      Parameters:
      objectCards - is the ObjectCard to add in the current player's shelf
      column - is the number of the column where the ObjectCard is added

    • isObjectCardAvailable

      public boolean isObjectCardAvailable(Coordinate coordinate)
      Check availability of the ObjectCard from the board
      Parameters:
      coordinate - are the board coordinates of the ObjectCard to check
      Returns:
      true if the ObjectCard can be taken by a player, false if not

    • pointsCalculator

      public int pointsCalculator()
      Calculate the points of the currentPlayer. Each time the method counts the points starting from 0. Then set the points to the currentPlayer.
      Returns:
      the point of the currentPlayer

    • calculateWinner

      public void calculateWinner()
      this method is used to calculate the winner of the game at the end of it, setting the winner attribute of the player who has the highest score to true

    • onConnectionMessage

      public Message onConnectionMessage(Message receivedConnectionMessage)
      Sub method of the class only used while during the game the server receives disconnection messages from the userPLayers in the game
      Parameters:
      receivedConnectionMessage - Message received by the server from a connecting or disconnecting UserPlayer
      Returns:
      a Message which contains the result of the received message

    • reconnectionHandler

      protected Message reconnectionHandler(LobbyMessage receivedConnectionMessage)
      Method used to handle the reconnection of a player from the game
      Parameters:
      receivedConnectionMessage - message received by the server from the player asking to reconnect to the game
      Returns:
      a Message which contains the result of the received message

    • setTimer

      public void setTimer()
      Method that start a timer whenever only one player is in the game
